Beagle Captain FitzRoy was on the verge of bankruptcy after trying to purchase a boat for personal needs.

I’ve come

so far and have gone through so much, and they won’t even let me buy a small boat?

Upset with the Admiralty for refusing

his funding request, Captain FitzRoy became enraged.

I’m resigning immediately!

Calm down, Captain!

The crew believes in you, Captain.

If you resign, what will they do?

Somehow we all have to get back to England.

And I mean All of us!

108
